basic_information.scholarship_name: The Dr. Merl Simmons Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to UCO students. Eligibility Requirements Students must be enrolled full-time Preference will be given to a former Annas House Foundation ward or to an Annas House Foundation (AHF) foster family child If no AHF applicants are eligible then preference will be given to a former foster student Preference is given to a student who is a pre-med major and intends to pursue a medical degree in pediatrics or a nursing degree with a pediatric specialty Two faculty letters of recommendation must be provided

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
